thread.title: Inside A Sports-Loving Teen’s $54,000 Closet

author: wsjcom
title: Inside A Sports-Loving Teen’s $54,000 Closet
text:
The sports-loving teenager had played baseball since age 3 and needed a place for his collection of 76 baseball caps and more than 30 pairs of sneakers, including vintage Air Jordans and Nike Flights.
So his parents, who live in Beverly Hills, Calif., hired Lisa Adams of LA Closet Design to create a closet for their 14-year-old son, telling her: “We would like to this to feel like a locker room.”
The...
